medical_history.chief_complaint: Heroin addiction and seeking alternative treatment options.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms W started using heroin at age 14, initially did not like it but became addicted. She has relapsed multiple times, especially during times of stress, and has been through detoxification more than 20 times with difficulties remaining drug-free.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hepatitis C (successfully treated), total hysterectomy, bilateral knee surgery, and cholecystectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Ms W has two living children and five grandchildren. She lost one teenager daughter to a gunshot wound. Not specified if there are hereditary conditions.
medical_history.social_history: Ms W has a history of intravenous heroin use, crack cocaine, various pills, acid, and marijuana. She was addicted to smoking cigarettes (about 2 packs per day) until quitting 7 years ago. Currently unemployed and lives in Boston.
